attributes.action: Request the Scottish television companies to broadcast traditional Scottish country dancing at Hogmanay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the world look to Scotland for some sort of guidance at the festive period of Hogmanay. They expect to see the Scottish people engaged in true Scottish highland dancing on their televison screens. They wamt to see the people taking part in the dances such as The Gay Gordons or Strip the willow and such. Some previous broadcast have shown the celebrations where the audience stood around listening to laments sung in Gaelic. They want to see a happy gathering at this time where they display in enjoyment and taking part in the traditional Scottish music associated with Scotland and Hogmanay. Please ask the television companies in Scotland to return to the days of old and encoursge the tourists to want to visit Scotland and all it has to offer.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
